title: Ackman’s hedge fund back in a big way with 58 percent return
text: After four straight years of losses, Bill Ackman is back in the black. title: The Debate Over Stock Buybacks, Explained | WSJ

title: Ben Bernanke says the Fed shouldn't rule out using negative interest rates
text: Former Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke cited the benefits of at least keeping the option alive to take short-term rates below zero. Doing so, he said, would give the Fed flexibility at a time when its policy toolkit is limited.
